title: The Kitchn Cookbook - Recipes, Kitchens & Tips to Inspire Yo
description:
The Kitchn Cookbook: Recipes, Kitchens & Tips to Inspire Your Cooking
by Sara Kate Gillingham and Faith Durand
Clarkson Potter | October 2014 | eISBN 978-0-7704-3444-1 | ePUB | 318 pages | 37.1 mb

From Apartment Therapy's cooking site, The Kitchn, comes 150 recipes and a cooking school with 50 essential lessons, as well as a guide to organizing your kitchen--plus storage tips, tool reviews, inspiration from real kitchens, maintenance suggestions, 200 photographs, and much more. WITH 18 RECIPES EXCLUSIVE TO THE EBOOK EDITION.
